body.name: Handheld Game Console - Retro Video Games, 400 Optimized Classic FC Games, 2.8-inch Color Screen, 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery, Supports TV Connection and Two Players, Christmas, (Red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins
features: 🎮【Portable and Unique Design】 Compact and thin body design, the perfect combination of tradition and fashion, equipped with an optimized system with higher stability, can provide an excellent gaming experience. The 2.8-inch color display allows you to show more details and scenes in the game. Whether you take it with you when you are on a business trip, traveling or camping, you can recall your gaming dreams and relax anytime and anywhere.

🎮【Optimized version of 400 super classic FC games】 This mini retro handheld game console has 400 classic games built-in. Classic FC games allow you to play 400 games without any ads or additional fees, including arcade retro games, puzzles, arcades, shooting, racing, fighting, and adventure games. Each game is a part of your childhood. of classics.

🎮【1020mAh Rechargeable Battery】The portable retro handheld game console has a built-in 1020mAh large-capacity lithium battery, and the portable handheld game can last up to 5-6 hours of gaming time after being fully charged. Very suitable for frequent business trips, traveling, and camping. No more worries about running out of battery. (Note: Please fully charge the retro handheld game console battery before first use.)
🎮【Play with the Family】Supports 2 Players and Play on TV: The box includes a console and a game controller to connect retro handheld consoles and gamepads to your TV. Enjoy family fun together

🎮 【Perfect Gift for Kids and Adults】The retro handheld game console not only brings fun gaming time to children, but also awakens the wonderful gaming time of adults born in the 80s and 90s, releasing their life stress. This retro handheld video game console for kids is the perfect gift option for birthdays, Christmas and New Year holiday moments, or any occasion. Purchase to get: (1) Game console (2) AV output cable (3) USB cable (4) User manual (5) Game controller
body.description: TV connection tips If you want to play on TV, please make sure your TV can be connected with AV OUTPUT cable before you buy. The handheld game console can only support NTSC TV. If you want to use the TV connection function, please understand and check your TV system The red end of the AV cable is the audio end, which is responsible for sound output and is connected to the red end of the TV (AUDIO) the yellow end of the AV cable is the video end, responsible for the image output, connected to the yellow end of the TV (VIDEO)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What it IS and isn't
reviews.reviewText: Ok so.....I have these games on their real original systems. I also have some clone type machines. In my picture there is a much more expensive product to the left that you can add roms to. It is a better quality thing that costs eight times as much. I'm not reviewing THAT though. I have considered that for this review to NOT compare apples and oranges.On the right...the red one is this actual product I'm going to review beyond "my kid loves it" reviews on here. I want you to know WHY someone would love or dislike it.So I got this for around 14 US dollars. I had one previously about 4 years ago that cost the same and looked the same. I think maybe that one had 500 games... Regardless the colors on some games are really over saturated on this and there is no way to fix that. Some games are running faster than originals....the famous plumber guy game is too fast. It's playable...but is amped up and if you know the original you WILl notice it. This is true with a few on here....if you don't know the originals then you might not notice what is "off" with color, sound and speed.There are NOT 400 games. Maybe 200 but I'm not sure. Games repeat on these things so expect that. Or it could be the same game with some kind of tweak or power ups or something. Scroll through it all but I don't think there's more than 200 legit games you would recognize. But then, that's a LOT of games for a little handheld cheap thing.Paperboy. It's the NES version...as are most games on here....and it runs nicely. I love having that game portable! Defender works nicely. Bubble Bobble, Dig Dug, 10 yard Fight (which I have always loved) ...Snow Bros...Tennis, Baseball, Contra, Donkey Kong....quite a few really good oldies that even if they run a little fast I would imagine your kid or Grandma won't notice.What the thing IS...is a cheap emulator that does have some early games on it that are playable. And for the price of a full MEAL at fastfood....you can have this.If you want a better experience, pay more and get the better handheld that games aren't sped up, more games, ads roms, etc.This is barebones basic. The screen is bright and I didn't notice much for problems than over saturated colors on some games but it isn't a high quality screen or machine. But it does pretty good for the money. If this had been available in the 90s I would have flat freaked and it would've been the best thing ever. I still think it's pretty great having spent my childhood stuck to a tv to play any video games. The battery charge will last a really long time...probably 12 hours.... and you will find games on here you love. Nuts and Milk or Milk and Nuts is fun and is often ignored by gamers....Loderunner...Mappy....more games you know and some pure trash games.I have it because I don't want to take my 90 dollar retro system just everywhere. I can take this instead to a lake or beach or picnic and not worry much.It feels very light and cheapish but that cheap feel is mostly how light it is...and of course it is smaller than the old Gameboys. Buttons work well and don't feel too squishy. Volume is controllable and the sound is...sort of horrible. I would grade sound worse than screen quality.This is for: nostalgia...a good gift for any age range but just understand....there are MUCH better systems to play these old games but they cost a lot more. I'm satisfied to play about 25 of these games A LOT. I can play Paperboy till my eyeballs fall out. It is worth a price between 12 and 20 IMO. A child or adult or elderly person should enjoy this. I did NOT hook it up to a tv. But you can. I have no reason to do that as I just wanted a little pocket gaming device that's cheap enough I won't cry for days if it falls in the lake.It's a 4.1 for what it IS. It's not junk but it's not perfect or great. In the inexpensive category....it rocks socks!It's worth the money if you know what it is and what it is not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my boys and it’s a hit! Has all the games you can imagine, I like that it’s rechargeable and is great for when you have to wait with a kiddo for extended periods of time. Totally worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this item twice. First time bought back in October. The port broke after a couple of times charging it. We missed the return window. Right after, my second son decide to buy another one. We bought two weeks ago and this one broke too. I hope the seller will see this review and refund me for the first item as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My child LOVES this, prefect traveling size and a overall great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun but short life
reviews.reviewText: Our 8 year old loved playing this but 2 months in the screen began to freeze when playing. He was so sad it no longer would work. Worth the purchase but know it may be short lived enjoyment.

reviews.reviewerName: Quality item will purchase from seller again
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Portable Retro Inspired Gaming Device
reviews.reviewText: Don’t expect what it’s not. It’s a handheld gaming device that has a lot of games. The games repeat. There aren’t as many as it claims, but there is enough of a selection. It has Super Mario and other classics. It does connect to the TV. However, the remote is still the “gameboy” along with the second remote. So you end up sitting very close to the TV. It would be better to connect to a computer screen.
